title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Rodgers Heat, OBJ WR2, Dave Wannstedt on Justin Fields Optimism, Cowboys Letdown, Jordan Love Debut Bust
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Rodgers Heat, OBJ WR2, Dave Wannstedt on Justin Fields Optimism, Cowboys Letdown, Jordan Love Debut Bust
description:
Colin discusses what Aaron Rodgers should've realized before he spoke out (3:00), what OBJ can learn from Melo (6:00), and how to properly settle the Nikola Jokic/Markieff Morris cheap shot beef (9:00). Then, FOX NFL Analyst and Former Bears and Dolphins HC Dave Wannstedt and Colin discuss why Justin Fields has Bears fans brimming with optimism despite another loss (11:00), their feelings on Aaron Rodgers mess and Jordan Love's rocky debut (23:00), how the Cowboys' loss to the Broncos reminds him of a rough loss during his time in Dallas (27:00), how Big Ben is taking a page from the Michael Jordan playbook, (30:00), the NFL coach of the year through 9 weeks (33:00), who Dave credits with the Cowboys D's stunning 2021 turnaround (38:00), and if Jalen Hurts can be a franchise QB in Philly (46:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
